name: kushon-app
description: Kushon - Title and volume management application

scripts.install: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run prisma:generate
scripts.start: npm run start:db && npm run start:backend && npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:db: docker run --name kushon-postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=kushon123 -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=kushon -p 5432:5432 -d postgres:15 || docker start kushon-postgres
scripts.clean: npm run stop:db && docker rm kushon-postgres || true
scripts.help: echo "Available commands: install, start, start:db, start:backend, start:frontend, stop:db, clean"
